mapper.select: select flwd.msisdn, flwd.name, ld.district, ld.block, ld.panchayat from report.front_line_worker_dimension flwd join report.registration_measure rm on rm.flw_id = flwd.id join report.location_dimension ld on ld.id = rm.location_id where flwd.id in (select distinct flw_id from report.course_item_measure);
